mapper.insert:
insert into plant_seed_content
seed_type,
seed_introduce,
contract_content,
#{seedType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONCAT("<style>img{max-width:100%!important;}</style>", #{seedIntroduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}),
CONCAT("<style>img{max-width:100%!important;}</style>", #{contractContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}),
mapper.update:
update plant_seed_content
seed_introduce =
CONCAT("<style>img{max-width:100%!important;}</style>", #{seedIntroduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}),
contract_content =
CONCAT("<style>img{max-width:100%!important;}</style>", #{contractContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}),
where seed_type = #{seedType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
